div.p: Next Facebook Live Event: (4/28/2020; 5:30 PM) Special Board Meeting can be viewed here Facebook Live. You do not need an account to view this meeting. If you have input regarding the next board meeting you can email your thoughts to csdinput@corvallis.k12.mt.us

span.strong: The Core Purpose of the Corvallis School District is to achieve excellence in educating the whole child in a safe environment so that students are prepared to succeed in life and become productive members of society.
